description: NEW: Unified header with global date context shared across all pages
steps: Step 1: Start the app and navigate to Timeline page
Step 2: Verify header shows date picker with arrows and Today/Yesterday presets
Step 3: Navigate to Analytics page - verify same date context is maintained
Step 4: Navigate to Reports page - verify same date context is maintained
Step 5: Change date in header and verify it updates across all pages

description: NEW: Date navigation arrows work correctly with constraints
steps: Step 1: Navigate to Timeline with today's date selected
Step 2: Click next arrow - verify it is disabled (cannot go past today)
Step 3: Click previous arrow - verify it navigates to yesterday
Step 4: Click previous arrow again - verify it continues going back
Step 5: Click next arrow - verify it navigates forward until today

description: NEW: Analytics page has multi-timeframe tabs (Day/Week/Month/Year/Custom)
steps: Step 1: Navigate to Analytics page
Step 2: Verify tabs are visible: Day, Week, Month, Year, Custom
Step 3: Click Day tab - verify stats show totals for selected day
Step 4: Click Week tab - verify stats show averages and trends for week
Step 5: Click Month tab - verify stats show averages and trends for month

description: NEW: Analytics charts use smart bucketing based on timeframe
steps: Step 1: Navigate to Analytics and select Day tab
Step 2: Verify chart shows hourly buckets (24 bars for hours)
Step 3: Switch to Week tab - verify chart shows daily buckets (7 bars)
Step 4: Switch to Month tab - verify chart shows daily buckets (28-31 bars)
Step 5: Switch to Year tab - verify chart shows monthly buckets (12 bars)

description: NEW: Click Analytics chart element drills down to Timeline for that specific day
steps: Step 1: Navigate to Analytics Week tab
Step 2: Click on a specific day bar in the activity chart
Step 3: Verify navigation to Timeline page occurs
Step 4: Verify Timeline shows the exact day that was clicked
Step 5: Verify session list loads for that selected day

description: NEW: Timeline to Analytics transition maintains date context
steps: Step 1: Navigate to Timeline and select a specific date (e.g., Jan 5)
Step 2: Click on Analytics in sidebar
Step 3: Verify Analytics opens with Day tab selected
Step 4: Verify Analytics shows data for the same date (Jan 5)
Step 5: Switch to Week tab - verify week expands around Jan 5

description: NEW: Analytics to Timeline transition uses appropriate date logic
steps: Step 1: Navigate to Analytics with Week tab (multi-day range)
Step 2: Click Timeline in sidebar without drilling down
Step 3: Verify Timeline shows the end date of the week range (capped at today)
Step 4: Return to Analytics, select a future week containing today
Step 5: Navigate to Timeline - verify it shows today (not future date)

description: NEW: Custom timeframe in Analytics with auto-bucketing
steps: Step 1: Navigate to Analytics and select Custom tab
Step 2: Enter a 2-day range - verify chart uses hourly buckets
Step 3: Enter a 30-day range - verify chart uses daily buckets
Step 4: Enter a 90-day range - verify chart uses weekly buckets
Step 5: Verify stats adapt appropriately to custom range

description: NEW: Reports page integrates with global timeframe context

Step 4: Verify the global date context updates to match the report's timeframe
